pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: x86
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x64
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel & AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel & AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: x64
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
